lead_paragraph: ROSENBAUM--Herbert D. May 18, 2016, age 95. Loving husband of Nikki, father of Edward (Davey) and Daniel (Olivia), grandfather of Shoshi, Michael, and Jeremy. Former president NYS Political Science Assn. and RVC Democratic Club. Professor Emeritus of Political Science at Hofstra University, where he taught for 40 years. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ROSENBAUM, HERBERT D

snippet: ROSENBAUM--Herbert D. May 18, 2016, age 95. Loving husband of Nikki, father of Edward (Davey) and Daniel (Olivia), grandfather of Shoshi, Michael, and Jeremy. Former president NYS Political Science Assn. and RVC Democratic Club. Professor Emeritus of Political Science at Hofstra University, where he taught for 40 years. 1/3
